description: Critical deadline configuration for bus service renewal system. Controls when notifications, access blocks, and account deletions occur.

academicYear.description: Academic year configuration - all services align to this end date

renewalNotification.description: When to start showing renewal reminders to students

renewalDeadline.description: Final date for students to complete renewal before access is affected

softBlock.description: When Track Bus access gets blocked for expired students
softBlock.warningText: Student's access to Live Bus Tracking will be blocked after this date, in the same deadline year if service is not renewed, while other features like payment, notification will still be accessible

hardDelete.description: When expired student accounts get permanently deleted
hardDelete.criticalWarningText: Account and all data of that student will be permanently deleted if hard delete occurs. It will occur 2 year after current year, i.e. if service taken in 2025, will get deleted in August 31st, 2027

urgentWarningThreshold.description: Show urgent warnings when this many days remain before hard delete
urgentWarningThreshold.displayText: URGENT: Only X days remaining before permanent deletion!

timeline.description: Complete timeline of events for display purposes
